data.name: Giftix
data.text: AwardBot is an open source advanced giveaway bot. Written in Discord.js. You can set conditions for the giveaways, automatically deliver the prizes, and lock the giveaways.

data.name: Saely
data.text: A service that streams the latest anime news in a fast and easy to use way.

data.name: Discord Bio
data.text: A service with many features that allows you to quickly prepare and publish your bio.

data.name: Weather App
data.text: A simple weather app that shows the weather of the city you want.
